response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I am pleased to offer it to you for $950,000. This price reflects the product's exceptional quality and the significant benefits it promises to bring to you. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the value I receive for such a valuable item. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we might proceed towards a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 950000}
